sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-container>
        <el-header>
            <el-row>
                <el-col>员工管理系统</el-col>
            </el-row>
        </el-header>

        <el-main>
            <el-form :model="ruleForm" status-icon :rules="staffRules" ref="ruleForm" label-width="100px" class="demo-ruleForm">
                <el-form-item label="密码" prop="password">
                    <el-input type="password" v-model="ruleForm.password" autocomplete="off"></el-input>
                </el-form-item>
                <el-form-item>
                    <el-button type="primary" @click="submitForm('ruleForm')">提交</el-button>
                    <el-button @click="resetForm('ruleForm')">重置</el-button>
                </el-form-item>
            </el-form>
        </el-main>
        <el-footer>

        </el-footer>
    </el-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: "Login",
    data() {
        var validatePassword = (rule, value, callback) => {
            if (value === '') {
                callback(new Error('请输入密码'));
            } else {
                if (this.ruleForm.password !== '') {
                    this.$refs.ruleForm.validateField('password');
                }
                callback();
            }
        };
        return {
            ruleForm: {
                password: '',
            },
            staffRules: {
                password: [
                    { validator: validatePassword, trigger: 'blur', message: '请输入密码', }
                ],
            }
        };
    },
    methods: {
        
    }
}

</script>

<style scoped></style>
